CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( "https://ap2.salesforce.com/00O28000001PDQg?pv0="& Engineer2__r.Name &"&pv1="&Engineer2__r.Name&"&pv2="& IF ( TEXT(Actual_Service_Date__c) <> "", TEXT(MONTH(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(DAY(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(YEAR(Actual_Service_Date__c)), "" ) , "First Technician" ,"_blank") &BR()&
HYPERLINK( "https://ap2.salesforce.com/00O28000001PDQg?pv0="& X2nd_Technician__r.Name &"&pv1="&X2nd_Technician__r.Name&"&pv2="& IF ( TEXT(Actual_Service_Date__c) <> "", TEXT(MONTH(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(DAY(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(YEAR(Actual_Service_Date__c)), "" ) , "Second Technician" ,"_blank") &BR()&
HYPERLINK( "https://ap2.salesforce.com/00O28000001PDQh?pv0="& Engineer2__r.Name &"&pv1="&X2nd_Technician__r.Name&"&pv2="& IF ( TEXT(Actual_Service_Date__c) <> "", TEXT(MONTH(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(DAY(Actual_Service_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(YEAR(Actual_Service_Date__c)), "" ) , "Both" ,"_blank")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Search using these links to see what the chosen Technicians are doing on the day
CustomField.label: On the Day
